quotes: AndroidIDE has been my favorite tool for developing android apps. I could code whenever and wherever i want.
name: BanDroid

quotes: I only code on phone, and for years there has been no option of an up-to-date IDE with passionate devs. If you have been on a similar journey, try AndroidIDE for one day, and if you are ready for kotlin, you will realize this is the way and the only way.
name: Allo
